name: Rat's Raid
description:
Rat's Raid is an interactive NFT. 
Your cat has been kidnapped and you'll have to get it back before it's too late.

Along the way you will have to defeat enemies, buy weapons and improve your skills using the shops.

On options menu, you can change the resolution of the game.

Controls:

Move: WASD or arrows
Punch/Attack with item: H or 1
Kick: J or 2
Throw item: K or 3
Pick item: U or 4
Interact: F
Jump: SPACE
Pause/Stats menu: P

There are 3 different shops: weapons store, doughnuts store and noodles store.
You can buy new weapons in the weapon store, increase your stats eating doughnuts or restore your health by eating some noodles!

Music credits:

Main themes:
"Epic Cinematic Gaming Cyberpunk | RESET" by Alex-Productions from chosic.com
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx0_M61F81Nfb-BRXE-SeVA

"Spiky Wheels" by EvgenyBardyuzha from pixabay.com
"Frantic" by lemonmusicstudio from pixabay.com
"Robo Cop (Synthwave)"" by Geibral from pixabay.com
